SELECT h.HOTEL_NO HOTEL_NO, h.HOTEL_NAME HOTEL_NAME, h.TAG_NO TAG_NO, h.IMG_PATH IMG_PATH, NVL(r.REVIEW_COUNT, 0) AS REVIEW_COUNT, MIN_PRICE FROM TB_HOTEL h LEFT JOIN (SELECT HOTEL_NO, COUNT(*) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY HOTEL_NO) r ON h.HOTEL_NO = r.HOTEL_NO
LEFT JOIN (SELECT HOTEL_NO, MIN(RO_PRICE) MIN_PRICE FROM TB_ROOM WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY HOTEL_NO) O ON h.HOTEL_NO = O.HOTEL_NO WHERE h.STATUS = 'Y' AND h.HOTEL_NAME LIKE ? AND O.MIN_PRICE IS NOT NULL

SELECT h.HOTEL_NO AS HOTEL_NO, h.HOTEL_NAME AS HOTEL_NAME, h.TAG_NO AS TAG_NO, h.IMG_PATH AS IMG_PATH, NVL(r.REVIEW_COUNT, 0) AS REVIEW_COUNT, O.MIN_PRICE AS MIN_PRICE FROM TB_HOTEL h LEFT JOIN (SELECT HOTEL_NO, COUNT(*) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY HOTEL_NO) r ON h.HOTEL_NO = r.HOTEL_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT HOTEL_NO, MIN(RO_PRICE) AS MIN_PRICE FROM TB_ROOM WHERE STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY HOTEL_NO) O ON h.HOTEL_NO = O.HOTEL_NO WHERE h.STATUS = 'Y' AND INSTR(',' || '?' || ',', ',' || h.TAG_NO || ',') > 0 AND O.MIN_PRICE IS NOT NULL;
